summary: SummaryNARS Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer is a lightweight tinted moisturizer that hydrates and smooths skin, with brightening Vitamin C and protective SPF 30.
details: DetailsBenefitsAdvanced formula protects with broad-spectrum SPF 30 and provides a translucent veil of colorBreakthrough Innovation:90% felt the product gave a healthy glow*90% felt the product left skin feeling soft*90% felt that after applying the product, their skin felt comfortable*87% felt the product was lightweight on skin*87% felt the product gave a more even-toned complexion*84% saw their skin being more radiant and luminous*84% felt their dark spots became less visible on bare skin*81% saw the product smoothing out the surface of the skin*81% felt instant hydration**Based on an independent U.S. consumer study after 4 weeks, on 31 participantsFeaturesSheer, buildable coverageRadiant, natural finishOil-freeParaben-freeSynthetic fragrance freeBroad Spectrum SPF 30Key IngredientsKopara, naturally derived polysaccharide extracts from French Polynesia, help to hydrate, condition, and refine the look of skin for a softer, smoother complexionVitamin C derivative - rich in antioxidants - helps to protect against environmental aggressors and even out skin tone for a brighter looking complexionItem 2504411How To UseDispense small amount of product. Warm with fingertips. Press and blend onto skin. Build to desired coverageIngredientsAlaska: Water, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate/Octinoxate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Diethylhexyl Succinate, Nylon-12, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Iron Oxides, Aluminum Hydroxide, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Stearic Acid, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Trisodium Edta, Fragrance, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Polysilicone-2, Talc, Limonene, Tocopherol, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Vibrio Alginolyticus Ferment Filtrate, Sea Salt, Geraniol, Bht, Linalool, Sodium Metabisulfite, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Citral, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Coumarin, Eugenol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense small amount of product. Warm with fingertips. Press and blend onto skin. Build to desired coverage

reviews.headline: Makes oily skin more oily
reviews.comments: I bought this at the suggestion of a store associate. It goes on smooth but within an hour my skin was super oily and oily wasn't the glow I was looking for. Disappointed

reviews.headline: Want to love
reviews.comments: I love this but it makes me break out... every time

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Great experience

reviews.headline: Pure Radiant
reviews.comments: Love it  but the price seems extremely high.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Works great on my mature skin!

reviews.headline: Light Coverage Superhero
reviews.comments:
This is so gorgeous. I've been using it for over 8 months and just ordered my second tube. A little goes a long way. It won't cover Acne, but for those of us with minor uneven skin tone and some fine wrinkles, it blurs "imperfections" and adds a beautiful glow. 
The only con in my eyes is that it doesnt last all day, especially if you have oilier skin.

reviews.headline: This is the best tinted moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I've used this product for years and it never disappoints. It goes on smooth over my skin cream. The color I chose blends in perfectly with my skin tone. I use a different tint for summer and for winter. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: I had to return this product
reviews.comments: I had to return this product because it expired in 2023. I use it once before noticing it was expired.  It seem to be a light weight product with enough coverage that I wouldn't have to wear foundation. I didn't re-purchase.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Excellent tinted moisturizer

reviews.headline: Love the coverage!
reviews.comments: Has great coverage

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Color match is exact. Its pretty, subtle, doesnt settle.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love the way it feels on my skin,and it looks natural

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a tinted moisturizer that also had coverage and I found the perfect product! I love the way it makes my skin look and feel. It doesn't make me break out, and doesn't look oily on my skin. It has wonderful coverage but you don't feel like you're wearing makeup. I highly recommend! I have the shade Gotland.

reviews.headline: Excellent - Lightweight Coverage - Moisture
reviews.comments: Excellent coverage - glides on easily and smoothly - basically full coverage.  Glad it has the SPF 30!

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Not enough coverage and made literally every pore on my skin breakout. Sheer glow is the best foundation I've ever bought, and I'm not sure what to do now that they've discontinued. ðŸ˜­

reviews.headline: returning tomorrow.
reviews.comments: I love a Moisturizing foundation, but this one is so cakey and doesn't work well with other products. After five minutes I added cream blush and Bronzer and everything began pilling and looked terrible.

reviews.headline: This is my second or third purchase!
reviews.comments: I love the quality and coverage of this moisturizer.  It has a bit of a matte finish which my oily skin needs and it doesn't cause any irritation.

reviews.headline: My fave
reviews.comments: Around four years ago, I had an Ulta employee recommend this to me as her favorite tinted moisturizer. Since then, I haven't bought any other tinted moisturizer besides this one. I wear mine in the summer, so it is great to wear day-to-day or I can do buildable coverage at night. It lasts pretty much all day or all night.

reviews.headline: Good stuff!
reviews.comments: Applies easily and stays on well even after a day of working, wearing masks all day!

reviews.headline: A Must Have Product!
reviews.comments: I love this tinted moisturizer! I've been using this for years and have repeatedly purchased. It's just the right amount of coverage while still being lightweight and easily blendable. It's great for dry skin and the finish is beautiful.

media.headline: I think this is the best skin tint for me so far
You will purchase this tinted again and again
You will purchase this tinted again and again
I cannot say enough good things
Finest Tinted Moisturizer for Natural Sheer Coverage
media.caption: In indirect natural light.

faceoff_positive.comments:
NARS Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer provides a little more coverage than most tinted moisturizers, but far less than standard liquid foundations.  This makes it perfect for minimalist and "no-makeup" makeup days.  It gives a beautiful, natural-looking finish that nevertheless provides a comfortable blendable surface for powder  face products (like blush, bronzer or highlighter).  The range of shades is somewhat limited in comparison to full-coverage foundations, but it melts so seamlessly into the skin that it adjusts to match the wearer's tone.  (I am very fair with very cool undertones, but Finland is plenty fair enough and its neutral undertones even out my own complexion and make it more friendly to all colors without looking unnatural.)

Although the coverage is sheer, it does an excellent job evening out the complexion, minimizing the look of hyperpigmentation and blemishes.  I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for this tier of coverage and skincare, and I'm thrilled that Ulta is now carrying a limited collection of NARS staples.
faceoff_positive.headline: Finest Tinted Moisturizer for Natural Sheer Coverage

faceoff_negative.comments: Hi, it's hard to find a tinted moisturiser for my skin tone because it's golden olive in a darker tone. Annapurna was perfect for it and now they have replaced this with new tones. I've been purchasing this product for years. Since i could wear makeup. The new colours don't even compare to Annapurna. It makes me look washed out or it's too dark. There's nothing in between. For people with skin tones like mine why couldn't they leave the colours that works!!! It's so disappointing because i went to top up on my product but it was gone, we were not informed of this new range coming in. I have tried replacements but nothing compares to consistency and type of coverage. Bring back Annapurna!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Annapurna discontinued
